data.name: Tempusia
data.detailed_description:
Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is a puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head: 3

TIME-REWINDING MECHANICS
In Tempusia, you can activate the "rewinding effect," and after it ends, a clone appears and copies everything the player did. To solve several puzzles, you must time the actions of the clones and the player.

There is also the checkpoint mechanic, which allows you to return to some state of the game. The map is designed to have multiple ways, and there is a special button at the end of each way. After activating all the buttons, you can open the ending gate. You can also use the checkpoint to comeback after you finish one way.

data.short_description: Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is the puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head :3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible Card or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible Card or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
